title: [FR] Add a set_artifact_uri function
body:
## Willingness to contribute
The MLflow Community encourages new feature contributions. Would you or another member of your organization be willing to contribute an implementation of this feature (either as an MLflow Plugin or an enhancement to the MLflow code base)?

- [ ] Yes. I can contribute this feature independently.
- [ ] Yes. I would be willing to contribute this feature with guidance from the MLflow community.
- [x] No. I cannot contribute this feature at this time. It might change.

## Proposal Summary

Add a _mlflow.set_artifact_uri_ to update artifact uri which change in my workflow. 

## Motivation
- What is the use case for this feature?
In my workflow I want to change where the model is stored based on some results. I have a local artifactory. When I think that my models need to be shared, I want to push them to a served instance of **MLFLOW**.

- Why is this use case valuable to support for MLflow users in general?
For now, i set it with **mlflow.create_experiment** with _artifact_location_ arguments.

- Why is this use case valuable to support for your project(s) or organization?
Help a smoother worflow setup.

- Why is it currently difficult to achieve this use case? (please be as specific as possible about why related MLflow features and components are insufficient)
I don't see another way of doing diffently, with _mlflow.create_experiment_
